page.title: 08Life In The Congresbury Area
page.content:
I live at Pool Farm, Hewish. The oldest part of my house is five hundred years old. My mother runs our house as a hotel so in the Summer when all our 17 rooms are taken I sleep in a caravan. In the Summer I am very busy and make lots of friends. I go riding on my pony, Mandi. We have two ponies and two horses. In the Winter I don't make so many friends and I can't ride because by the time I get home from school it is dark so I read. Our house is situated on the A 370 and we have lanes all around us. I like to ride my horse and my bike down them.
Victoria Smith, Priory School, Weston-super-Mare.
